control.label: Select
Back
Boot Path & Startup
Cooling & Front Panel
Enhancements
Storage & Drive Config
Video & Display
Debug & Advanced
Save Settings
Default Settings
[B][UPPERCASE]Error[/UPPERCASE][/B]
[B]Outdated Configuration Detected:[/B] Your system is running an outdated cerbios version. Please update Cerbios and cerbios.ini to the latest Cerbios release.
[B][UPPERCASE]Boot Path & Startup[/UPPERCASE][/B]

[B]Dashboard Defaults:[/B] If the dashboard is unavailable, the system will fall back to these default locations: - E:\Cerbios\Recovery\default.xbe for Recovery Mode - C:\xboxdash.xbe for the Original Xbox Dashboard
Dashboard Path
[B]Custom Boot Animation File Path:[/B] If the specified file is not found, the system will default to: - E:\Cerbios\BootAnims\Xbox\bootanim.xbe
BootAnim Path
[B][UPPERCASE]Video & Display[/UPPERCASE][/B]
[B]AV Pack Verification:[/B] - Allows enabling or disabling of AV Pack verification
AV Check
[B]Flicker Filter Level:[/B] - Adjusts the flicker filter to reduce screen flicker in interlaced display modes. - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_flickerfilter)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,System)] System [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Off)] Off [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Slight)] Slight [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Moderate)] Moderate [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Balanced)] Balanced [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Enhanced)] Enhanced [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_flickerfilter,Strong)] Strong [/ONCLICK]
[B]Forced 480p Output:[/B] - Enables 480p output for video modes that typically use 480i. - Component cables are required.
Force 480p
[B]Forced VGA Output:[/B] - Enables VGA output when using component or custom VGA cables. - Sets the console to NTSC mode and enables Force 480p.
Force VGA
[B][UPPERCASE]Storage & Drive Config[/UPPERCASE][/B]

[B]Drive Setup Modes:[/B] - Standard Mode: Requires a disc drive. - Legacy Mode: Operates with HDD onlydisables DVD functionality. - Modern Mode: Operates with HDD onlydisables DVD functionality completely. - Dual HDD Mode: Allows two hard drives for expanded storage options. - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_drivesetup)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_drivesetup,Standard Mode)] Standard Mode [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_drivesetup,Legacy Mode)] Legacy Mode [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_drivesetup,Modern Mode)] Modern Mode [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_drivesetup,Dual HDD Mode)] Dual HDD Mode [/ONCLICK]

[B]UDMA Mode for Primary (Master) HDD:[/B] - This HDD supports up to UDMA $INFO[System.hddsupportedudmamode]. - Recommended Setting: UDMA 4 for best compatibility. - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_udmamodemaster)][/B]

[B]UDMA Mode for Primary (Master) HDD:[/B] - This drive supports up to UDMA $INFO[System.hddsupportedudmamode]. - Most SATA adapters are not compatible with UDMA $INFO[System.hddsupportedudmamode]. - Recommended Setting: UDMA 4 for best compatibility. - Current Mode: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_udmamodemaster)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,System)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 1)] UDMA 1 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 2)] UDMA 2 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 3)] UDMA 3 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 4)] UDMA 4 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 5)] UDMA 5 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodemaster,UDMA 6)] UDMA 6 [/ONCLICK]

[B]UDMA Mode for Secondary (Slave) HDD:[/B] - Most SATA adapters are not compatible with UDMA 5 and 6. - Recommended Setting: UDMA 4 for best compatibility. - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_udmamodeslave)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,System)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 1)] UDMA 1 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 2)] UDMA 2 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 3)] UDMA 3 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 4)] UDMA 4 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 5)] UDMA 5 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_udmamodeslave,UDMA 6)] UDMA 6 [/ONCLICK]
[B][UPPERCASE]Cooling & Front Panel[/UPPERCASE][/B]
[B]Fan speed settings:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_fanspeed)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,Auto)] Auto [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,10%)] 10% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,20%)] 20% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,30%)] 30% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,40%)] 40% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,50%)] 50% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,60%)] 60% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,70%)] 70% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,80%)] 80% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,90%)] 90% [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_fanspeed,100%)] 100% [/ONCLICK]

[B]LED Ring Colour Cycle:[/B] The LED ring cycles through the following colours in order: - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_ledcolour1)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_ledcolour2)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_ledcolour3)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_ledcolour4)][/B] -
[B]$INFO[ListItem.Label][/B]
[B]$INFO[ListItem.Label][/B]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_ledcolour1,Green), Skin.SetString(cerbios_ledcolour2,Green), Skin.SetString(cerbios_ledcolour3,Green), Skin.SetString(cerbios_ledcolour4,Green)] Reset [/ONCLICK]
[B]In-Game LCD Display Support:[/B] - Enables LCD screen functionality for SMBus-connected displays during gameplay.
SMBus LCD Support
[B]Configure I2C Address for LCD Display:[/B] - Set the I2C address within the valid range: 0x20-0x27 or 0x38-0x3F, depending on the module type.
LCD I2C Address
[B]Select I2C Protocol for LCD:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_lcdi2cproto)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_lcdi2cproto,HD44780 compatible (LCD2004))] HD44780 compatible (LCD2004) [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_lcdi2cproto,US2066 (NHD-0420CW))] US2066 (NHD-0420CW) [/ONCLICK]
[B][UPPERCASE]Enhancements[/UPPERCASE][/B]
[B]On-the-Fly XBE Patching:[/B] - Enables real-time XBE patching for overclocked or CPU-upgraded Xbox consoles. - Note: This feature has no effect on stock configurations.
Advanced CPU Support
[B]Prevent Game-Initiated Dashboard Updates:[/B] - Blocks games from modifying the dashboard. - For softmodded consoles running Cerbios as a BFM BIOS to safeguard system files from being overwritten.
Block MS Dashboard Update
[B]Read-Only C Partition:[/B] - Marks the C partition as read-only, preventing write operations while Cerbios is active. Useful for softmod installation scenarios.
Read Only C

[B]Redirect Xbox Live Dashboard Calls:[/B] - Routes Xbox Live dashboard requests to `Xonlinedash_Original.xbe`. - Useful for softmod setups that employ a dummy `Xonlinedash.xbe` to prevent disc-initiated updates.
Redirect XonlineDash
[B]DVD Tray Eject Reset:[/B] - Restores the original Xbox behaviour where ejecting the DVD tray triggers a console reset.
Reset On Eject
[B]Real-Time Clock (RTC) Synchronization:[/B] - Enables RTC synchronization with compatible optional hardware via SMBus.
RTC Support

[B]Framebuffer Screenshot Capture:[/B] - Enables capturing screenshots of the running XBE’s framebuffer. - Images are saved to $INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_screenshotpart)]:\Cerbios\Screenshots\(Title ID) upon pressing the screenshot button combination.
Screenshot Capture
[B]Redirect to HDD:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_screenshothdd)][/B]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshothdd,Master)] Master [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshothdd,Slave)] Slave [/ONCLICK]
[B]Select Partition to save Screenshots:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_screenshotpart)][/B]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshotpart,E)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshotpart,F)] F [/ONCLICK]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshotpart,E)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshotpart,F)] F [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_screenshotpart,G)] G [/ONCLICK]
[B]Game-Specific Compatibility Fixes:[/B] - Enables targeted fixes to improve compatibility for specific games.
Title Patches
[B]Redirect Saves:[/B] - Redirects UDATA and TDATA to an alternate drive or partition.
UDATA/TDATA Redirection
[B]Redirect to HDD:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_tudataredirhdd)][/B]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirhdd,Master)] Master [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirhdd,Slave)] Slave [/ONCLICK]
[B]Select Partition for UDATA/TDATA:[/B] - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_tudataredirpart)][/B]
[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirpart,System)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirpart,F)] F [/ONCLICK]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirpart,System)] Default [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirpart,F)] F [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_tudataredirpart,G)] G [/ONCLICK]
[B]Ignore XBE 64MB Memory Limit:[/B] - When enabled, bypasses the 64MB memory restriction for XBEs.
XBE Memory limit bypass
[B][UPPERCASE]Debug & Advanced[/UPPERCASE][/B]

[B]XDK Launcher/XBDM Debugging Support:[/B] - Loads XDK Launcher/XBDM if available, enabling debugging features. - Boots C:\xshell.xbe (XDK Launcher Dashboard) if present. - Loads E:\xbdm.dll if present.
Debug support
[B]IGR Controller Selection:[/B] - Specifies which controller port can trigger In-Game Reset (IGR) combos. - Current Setting: [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrmasterport)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrmasterport,ALL)] ALL [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrmasterport,Port 1)] Port 1 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrmasterport,Port 2)] Port 2 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrmasterport,Port 3)] Port 3 [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrmasterport,Port 4)] Port 4 [/ONCLICK]

[B]Full Kernel Reset:[/B] - Unmounts any loaded ISO, CCI, or game and performs a full kernel reset, returning to the dashboard. - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrfull_1)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrfull_2)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrfull_3)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrfull_4)][/B] -
Change Button Combo

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Black), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_2,Left Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_3,Right Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_4,Back)] Default [/ONCLICK]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,)] - [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,A)] A [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,B)] B [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,X)] X [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Y)] Y [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Black)] Black [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,White)] White [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Left Trigger)] Left Trigger [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Right Trigger)] Right Trigger [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,DPad Up)] DPad Up [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,DPad Down)] DPad Down [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,DPad Left)] DPad Left [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,DPad Right)] DPad Right [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Start)] Start [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Back)] Back [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Left Thumb)] Left Thumb [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrfull_1,Right Thumb)] Right Thumb [/ONCLICK]

[B]Full Power Cycle:[/B] - Performs a complete power cycle of the console, fully rebooting the system. - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrcycle_1)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrcycle_2)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrcycle_3)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrcycle_4)][/B] -
Change Button Combo

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrcycle_1,Black), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrcycle_2,Left Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrcycle_3,Right Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrcycle_4,DPad Up)] Default [/ONCLICK]

[B]Shutdown:[/B] - Shuts down the console. - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrshutdown_1)][/B] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrshutdown_2)] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrshutdown_3)] - [B]$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_igrshutdown_4)][/B] -
Change Button Combo

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrshutdown_1,Left Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrshutdown_2,Right Trigger), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrshutdown_3,DPad Up), Skin.SetString(cerbios_igrshutdown_4,Back)] Default [/ONCLICK]

Show Overclocking Settings

[B]Warning:[/B] Advanced users only — incorrect values may cause instability or damage. This feature directly controls CPU/GPU frequency via 3-byte hex registers (e.g. 0x23A801). Trial and error is required. Use Eject to reset to safe defaults. Test gradually, monitor temps, and increase fan speed if overclocking.
Enable Overclocking

[B]CPU Phase-Locked Loop Coefficient:[/B] - Controls CPU overclock via a 4-byte hex (e.g. 0x230801). - Stock Xbox: 733 MHz @ 0x230801 (5.5× CPU multiplier). - Example: 802 MHz CPU / 218 MHz RAM @ 0x232304. - Current Setting: [B]0x$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_cpumpllcoeff)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_cpumpllcoeff,000000)] Reset [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetBool(hex_entry), Skin.Reset(cerbios_cpumpllcoeff), Skin.SetString(cerbios_cpumpllcoeff), Skin.Reset(hex_entry)] Set CPU PLL Value [/ONCLICK]

[B]NVIDIA Phase-Locked Loop Coefficient:[/B] - Sets GPU clock via 3-byte hex (e.g. 0x011C01). - Stock GPU: 233 MHz @ 0x011C01. - Example OC: 266 MHz @ 0x012001. - Current Setting: [B]0x$INFO[Skin.String(cerbios_nvpllcoeff)][/B]

[ONCLICK Skin.SetString(cerbios_nvpllcoeff,000000)] Reset [/ONCLICK] [ONCLICK Skin.SetBool(hex_entry), Skin.Reset(cerbios_nvpllcoeff), Skin.SetString(cerbios_nvpllcoeff), Skin.Reset(hex_entry)] Set NVIDIA PLL Value [/ONCLICK]
[B][UPPERCASE]Save Settings[/UPPERCASE][/B]
Save your current configuration to E:\Cerbios\cerbios.ini
[B][UPPERCASE]Default Settings[/UPPERCASE][/B]
Restore the default settings to E:\Cerbios\cerbios.ini
